Posts.Content: Jul 27, 2010 05:02AM Kelly48005 wrote: Hi! My name is Kelly and I to have cancer! I will be having a double mastectomy w/ lymph node dissection, and port place also this Thur. the 29th of July. I am 39 yrs. old. I too am scared.... to say the least. I will be starting chemo at the end of Aug. I think is the plan. I only hear some of what the Doc. tell me.  So much goes in one ear and out the other...... Good Luck! Please kept me posted for this is so new to me as well. Thanks! Kelly
Posts.Title: I have cancer...It is sinking in...uuuggghhh... Ondagrow Ondagrow

Posts.Content: Jul 27, 2010 08:18PM Kelly48005 wrote: My girls are  6 and almost 8. I have told them that I have BC. and i need to have surgery to get it out and then I'll need special meds. to take of the rest. They know I will be losing my hair, I have told them that they can help shave it when it is time, they were happy about that.... I have also told them if they have any questions, to please ask either myself or there dad and we will do our best to ansewer them.
Posts.Title: Help I'm Scared!!!!! Kelly48005 chrissyb

Posts.Content: Kelly48005 wrote: Hello, My name is Kelly, I am 39 and I was diagnosed this passed June. I am facing a double mastectomy, lymph node dissection and port placement this coming Thursday the 29th of July. I have also chosen to do reconstruction at the same time. I am totally fricking out and can not sleep well. I have a loving husband and two young girls who don't understand what is going on with me. Can anyone out there give me some help so this won't be so scary for me. The thought of losing both breast, and hair is to much to take.... I cry a lot !!!!! So, any advice is surely welcomed. Thanks! Kelly Dx 6/24/2010, 2cm, Stage IIB, Grade 2, ER+/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Help I'm Scared!!!!! Kelly48005 chrissyb

Posts.Content: Jul 27, 2010 08:22PM Kelly48005 wrote: Thank you all for your support and stories, these help make you feel like your not a lone out here. I will do my best to keep you all informed. Thank you again!!!!! Kelly
